app.title: Memo AI Coach
app.subtitle: Intelligent text evaluation and feedback system

home.description: Transform your writing with AI-powered evaluation and personalized feedback. Get comprehensive insights to improve your business memos and professional communication.

smartEvaluation.title: Smart Evaluation
smartEvaluation.description: Advanced AI analyzes your text against comprehensive rubrics, providing detailed scoring and insights.

actionableFeedback.title: Actionable Feedback
actionableFeedback.description: Receive specific, actionable suggestions to improve clarity, structure, and impact of your writing.

detailedAnalytics.title: Detailed Analytics
detailedAnalytics.description: Comprehensive breakdown of strengths and opportunities with segment-level feedback for targeted improvement.

step1.title: Submit Your Text
step1.description: Paste your memo or business text into our evaluation system.

step2.title: AI Analysis
step2.description: Our AI evaluates your text using comprehensive business writing criteria.

step3.title: Get Feedback
step3.description: Receive detailed feedback with scores, strengths, and improvement suggestions.

textInput.title: Submit Text for Evaluation
textInput.description: Enter your text below for comprehensive AI-powered evaluation and feedback.
textInput.label: Text to Evaluate
textInput.preparingText: Preparing your text for AI evaluation
textInput.breakingDownContent: Breaking down your content for analysis

feedback.noEvaluationDesc: Submit your text for evaluation to see comprehensive feedback
feedback.segmentAnalysisDesc: Segment-level analysis will appear here when available

help.title: Help & Documentation
help.textInputDesc: Submit any business memo, report, proposal, or professional text for evaluation.
help.overallFeedbackDesc: Get comprehensive evaluation with weighted overall score and detailed insights.
help.rubricScoresDesc: Detailed breakdown across 4 core business writing criteria with weighted scoring.
help.detailedFeedbackDesc: Segment-level analysis with specific comments, questions, and improvement suggestions.
help.adminPanelDesc: System management tools for administrators including configuration and user management.
help.quickStartStep1: Go to Text Input and paste your business memo or professional text
help.quickStartStep2: Click Submit for Evaluation and wait for AI analysis
help.quickStartStep3: View your Overall Feedback with comprehensive scores and insights
help.quickStartStep4: Review detailed Rubric Scores for targeted improvements
help.quickStartStep5: Analyze Segment Feedback for specific text sections
help.segmentAnalysisDesc: Detailed feedback on specific text sections with questions and suggestions.
help.rubricIntro: Your business memo is evaluated across 4 core criteria using a weighted scoring system (1-5 scale):
help.scorePoor: 1 - Poor: Significant issues, needs major revision
help.scoreBelowAverage: 2 - Below Average: Several areas need improvement
help.scoreAverage: 3 - Average: Adequate but could be enhanced
help.scoreGood: 4 - Good: Well-written with minor improvements possible

scoring.good: Good - Solid work with room for improvement
scoring.requiresRevision: Requires Major Revision - Does not meet basic standards
